about_the_game:
Return to the Golden Days of video game knowledge, back before the internet, when the best way to learn the deep secrets of a video game was to purchase and study a strategy guide!

That's right, Street Cleaner: The Video Game has an official strategy guide! Originally produced and sold with the boxed special edition of the game, the guide contains full color maps of every stage outlining positions of powerups and enemies, provides hints and tips for facing off against the many bosses of the game, and has insights into the production of the game written by the developers themselves.

Don't get caught dead in the mean streets of San Diego without it. Download the Street Cleaner: The Video Game Strategy Guide as FREE DLC now!

(This DLC download consists of a PDF file. Viewing the guide requires a program capable of viewing PDF files. After downloading, the file can be found in the directory containing the game.)
